text:
[Verse]
Neon lights they shine so bright
Running wild in city nights
Lost among the city's height
Searching for a dream in sight

[Verse 2]
Streets are busy people flow
Faces flash in endless show
Every place we wander know
Finding where our hearts can go

[Chorus]
Lost in the city oh
Where do we belong
Lost in the city oh
Singing our own song

[Verse 3]
Skyline's glow as daylight fades
In the crowd yet feel like shades
Trains are roaring like cascades
Echoes of familiar trade

[Verse 4]
Every alley every turn
New adventures to discern
In the chaos we can learn
Where our passions truly burn

[Chorus]
Lost in the city oh
Where do we belong
Lost in the city oh
Singing our own song
title: Lost in the City
